synopsis.text: Aniplex USA brings us a thrilling supernatural mystery set in January 1999 at Reien Academy, where apprentice mage Azaka Kokutou, the younger sister of Mikiya, is tasked by her mentor Touko Aozaki to investigate an unusual incident involving memory-stealing fairies. Azaka teams up with Shiki, who possesses the unique ability to see these invisible creatures. As they delve deeper into the case, they discover that the student council president, Misaya Ouji, is controlling the fairies, but the true mastermind behind the scheme is Satsuki Kurogiri, a magus with the power to manipulate words. Shiki's encounter with Satsuki triggers a forgotten memory of her encounter with Souren Araya two years prior, adding another layer to this intricate tale. Will Azaka and Shiki be able to put their differences aside and work together to save their classmates and put an end to this enchanting menace? Find out in this exciting sixth installment in the chronological timeline.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
